en.title: FE Launches In The USA !
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to announce its launch in the USA at the 2008 PGA Merchandise Show, Orange County Convention Centre, Orlando, Florida, USA from January 17th-19th 2008.


The PGA Merchandise Show in Orlando is the WORLD’S LARGEST golf exhibition for golf products and services, attended by all the who’s who’s in the golf industry. Special events at the show include the annual PGA America Awards Night (honouring 11 award winners, including the PGA Golf Professional of the Year and the Ernie Sabayrac Award).


FusionExcel has taken a large premium area at the 2008 PGA Merchandise Show, Orlando to launch our Quantum Pendant in the USA. Our American leaders, including Lance Reader (2004 World Golf Long Drive Record Holder) and Scott Smith(current World Golf Long Drive Record Holder) will be at FusionExcel’s booth during the launch to promote our Quantum Pendant.


The USA is the LARGEST MLM market in the world today with annual sales of USD 30 billion. This is 20 TIMES the size of Malaysia’s MLM market of around USD 1.5 billion per annum!


FusionExcel’s step of entering the USA market is part of our global expansion programme which will provide a whole lot of new opportunities for our leaders and will take them to greater heights with totally new levels of income potential that are unimaginable in Malaysia.


Start contacting your American friends and we look forward to seeing you and your American leaders at our launch at the 2008 PGA Merchandise Show, Orlando, Florida, USA!

meta.description:
"Great News! For the month of October and November 2007, FE is having a PROMOTION whereby All New Members will be provided with FOUR(4) months FREE MAINTENANCE (including the month of joinining)
Hurry! Get your prospects to JOIN NOW!
meta.author: klhunter
